About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

I am a third year undergraduate student at the University of Connecticut majoring in Computer Science with a minor in Data Analytics. My favorite programming language is Python. I am also a huge Boston Celtics fan.

Technical Skills

  • Programming Languages: Python (Proficient), C (Proficient), Java (Familiar), HTML/CSS/JavaScript (Familiar)
  • Concepts: Object Oriented Design (OOD), Algorithms, Data Structures, Software Design & Development
  • Tools/Platforms: Linux (Ubuntu), Git, MS Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Virtual Box, LaTeX, CAD, Adobe XD
  • Language: Arabic (Bilingual)

Walgreens

Photo Specialist/Pharmacy Technician

  • Produced professional photo products for customers
  • Troubleshooted and repaired photo machines and online photo services
  • Ordered and managed supplies for photo center
  • Filled and sold prescriptions to patients
  • Handled problems with prescriptions and insurance companies

ACM

Web Development Subgroup Member

  • Attended workshops to help build a foundation in web development
  • Created multiple mini-projects to futher reinforce web development concepts learned
  • Helped new members work on individual projects to gain a greater understanding of web development
